talk15: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Then have a pleasant rest until night.
talk17: <sp:3:0:2:0100>Did you sleep well? Enjoy your day, then.
talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Did you sleep well? It's still dark outside,
so mind your step.
Talk_4000:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Shitauchi><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I had no idea Worten could be so stubborn.
He would always humor me before we got
married, no matter what I asked.<sp:0:4:0>Would it be so hard for him to wear a simple Cece-
brand hat? <sp:5:1:0>I don't understand why he's this dead
set against it.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh...<sp:5:1:0> Can I help you?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0400>Oops. <sp:5:1:0>I really can't be dwelling on that right now.<sp:5:0:0>
Not while I'm on the clock.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>How was the downy-soft bed? <sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Did you get a deeper sleep than usual?
Well, at any rate, take care!
Talk_4001:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Maybe the next time Worten is leaning carelessly
against the terrace, I'll catch him off guard and jam
a hat on his head.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>How was the downy-soft bed? <sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Did you get a deeper sleep than usual?
Well, at any rate, safe travels!
talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>How was the downy-soft bed? <sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Did you get a deeper sleep than usual?
It's still dark outside, so mind your step.
talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Yes! They're much more comfortable to
sleep on than our standard beds.<sp:0:4:0>You'll wake up feeling nice and refreshed.
Everyone who sleeps on one talks about
how they feel brimming with energy.
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>How do I keep letting this guy distract me?<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Can't he see how desperate I am to hear what those
three are saying about the treasure? Is a little
privacy while I eavesdrop so much to ask?<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_1002:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Can't he see how desperate I am to hear what those
three are saying about the treasure? Is a little
privacy while I eavesdrop so much to ask?<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
SagonoHat: I was gonna get that hat.
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Pardon me. If you're here to reserve a
room, you should ask at the counter.<sp:0:4:0>I just got off my shift, so I'm on break
while my husband takes his turn.
Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Maybe tonight I'll finally figure out how to get my
husband to wear Cece-brand clothes. <sp:5:0:0>Can't he
understand how important they are to me?<sp:0:4:0>I think I'll ask one of the three Cece fans who stay
here often if they have any advice.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Um, if you need to reserve a room, you
should ask at the front desk.<sp:0:4:0>I just got off my shift, you see. I'm on
break while my husband takes his turn.
Talk_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>How do I keep getting distracted from the matter
at hand?<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>There must be some way to convince my husband
to wear Cece-brand clothes. <sp:5:0:0>Maybe today's the
day I'll figure it out.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_00>Welcome to <clr:0000>Ton Pu Inn<clr:ffff>! Will you be
staying with us today?
Talk_5000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>I'm sorry I tried to force you to wear
Cece-brand clothes without giving you
a say in it.<sp:0:4:0>After I saw how our candidates for mayor
carried on, I did some hard thinking.
Talk_3000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Are you here for a room?<sp:0:4:0>I'd be happy to attend to you at the
counter. I'll only be a moment.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>Hmph. I couldn't quite hear what they were saying
about the treasure today either. If only those three
weren't so hush-hush about it!<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_5001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Aw, I'd love you no matter how you dress.<sp:0:4:0>Though this might be the time to talk
about our budget, and where those outfits
fit into it.
Talk_3001:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>If you'd like to reserve a room, I'd be
happy to attend to you at the counter.
I'll only be a moment.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>It happened again!<sp:0:4:0>If I get interrupted one more time before I can hear
what they're saying about that treasure, I'm going to
forget everything I know about customer service!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_04: <clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0201>He's clearly just acting out for attention...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_5002:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionAngry_01>Huh? I thought we were talking about
your fashion sense, not mine. <sp:5:1:0>Hang on...
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>Um...sir? <sp:5:0:0>Do you need something?<sp:0:4:0>I'd really prefer to help you from across
the counter, <sp:5:0:0>if that's all right.
Talk_2000:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I can almost make out what they're saying...<sp:0:4:0>Misku... <sp:5:1:0>Or is it Nisko? <sp:5:0:0>It's still too muffled.<sp:0:4:0>Whatever it is, they're definitely talking about
treasure. And given the source...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>The prize must be some outrageously stylish
clothes. <sp:5:1:0>I have to know more!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_5003:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Yes? <sp:5:1:0>Can I help you?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0400>Oops. <sp:5:1:0>I really can't be having this conversation
right now. <sp:5:0:0>Not while I'm on the clock.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive_00>Sir, <sp:5:0:0>this kind of behavior is uncalled-for.
You're going to upset our other guests.
Talk_2001:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Lisko? <sp:5:1:0>No. <sp:5:0:0>Bisko, maybe? Hmm...I still can't quite
make it out.<sp:0:4:0>But the treasure they're talking about must be some
outrageously stylish clothes.<sp:0:4:0>I have to know more!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>A regular bed is <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0> Or, if you're
looking for a more relaxing and restorative
mind-and-body experience...<sp:0:4:0>You can have one of our extra-soft downy
beds for <clr:0000>30 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Good morning! We're having nice weather
again today.
talk09: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Take care, and visit us again soon.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hello there! We're having nice weather
again today.
talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal>Sir. <sp:5:0:0>You're not carrying enough money
for that. I'm sorry, but no.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Chat_00>Good evening! You must be ready to relax
for the night after a long journey.
talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Very well, one regular bed. And when
would you like to be woken up?
Talk_10: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Chat_00>It must be good to get out from the rain.
talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Very well, one downy-soft bed. And when
would you like to be woken up?
talk13: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Then have a pleasant rest until morning.
talk14: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Then have a pleasant rest until noon.
